title: [Update] Apex Legends Mobile to fully launch later this ‘summer’ w/ Android pre-registration now open
content:
After a limited beta release in selected regions, Respawn Entertainment’s massive looter shooter Apex Legends Mobile is set to come to Android and iOS later this “summer.”

more…

The post [Update] Apex Legends Mobile to fully launch later this ‘summer’ w/ Android pre-registration now open appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: After a limited beta release in selected regions, Apex Legends Mobile is set to come to Android and iOS later this "summer."
